author: Rachelle Tonelada
title: Philippines celebrates 8th year of SCS arbitral award, affirms commitment to assert sovereign rights
text:
The Philippines, together with the international community, reaffirmed its commitment in protecting and promoting ‚Äúpeople‚Äôs interest and the full and responsible enjoyment of legally settled maritime entitlements and its accompanying rights and jurisdictions.‚Äù
As the 2016 arbitral award on the South China Sea (SCS) marked its 8th year, the Department of Foreign Affairs (DFA) said the Philippines remains unwavering in its commitment to peace ‚Äúeven in the face of the unlawful actions which have caused serious incidents in the South China Sea.‚Äù
‚ÄúThe Philippines has continued to demonstrate this commitment. Without ever diminishing our resolve to protect and promote our people‚Äôs interest and the full and responsible enjoyment of our legally settled maritime entitlements and its accompanying rights and jurisdictions,‚Äù the DFA stated.
Echoing the same sentiment, Philippine Ambassador to the United States Jose Manuel Romualdez emphasized ‚Äúthe Philippines has long been a staunch advocate of the rule of law.‚Äù
‚ÄúThis is exemplified by Manila‚Äôs move to institute arbitral proceedings against China at the Permanent Court of Arbitration in 2013. On July 12, 2016, the Philippines became a prime example of how international law can be leveraged against neighbors with hegemonic ambitions,‚Äù he noted.
Romualdez asserted that although the Philippines has come a long way with the 2016 arbitral award, there are still a lot of things to be done and vowed to ‚Äúcontinue to utilize diplomatic channels and employ a multilateral approach in asserting [its] rights and reinforcing a stronger defense posture.‚Äù
‚ÄúOur efforts in the government, such as firm pronouncement and reinforcements of security capabilities combined with those of civil society organizations, such as civilian-led missions to the West Philippine Sea, are key steps towards realizing our national interest,‚Äù he said.
‚ÄúWe have ramped up our efforts through strengthened partnerships, including our alliance with the United States,‚Äù Romualdez added.
Moving forward, the DFA declared it will continue to ‚Äúchart a course anchored on peace, security and prosperity in our region,‚Äù highlighting the importance of partnership and diplomacy with key countries.
‚ÄúWe are encouraged by the expressions of support made by other States that confirm the final and binding status of the Award, including the G7‚Äôs consistent reaffirmation that it is a significant milestone and a useful basis for the peaceful management and resolution of differences at sea,‚Äù the DFA said in a statement.
‚ÄúThe Award is a reaffirmation of the United Nations Convention on the Law of the Sea and protects our rights as a coastal state and a seafaring people. Every effort to secure our legitimate interests in our maritime domain is a testament to the determination and courage of the Filipino people, while showcasing the Philippines‚Äô vision of peace and stability that inspires and resonates beyond the waters of the South China Sea,‚Äù it added.

author: Jana St√§bener
title: ‚ÄûKonnte es nicht genie√üen": Deutsche r√§t deutlich von beliebtem Reiseziel ab
text:
‚ÄûKonnte es nicht genie√üen‚Äú: Deutsche r√§t deutlich von beliebtem Reiseziel ab
Eine Frau berichtet auf TikTok, sie ‚Äûw√ºrde keiner Person empfehlen, nach Sansibar zu reisen‚Äú. Ein Geschichtsprofessor erl√§utert, warum sie damit recht hat.
Traumstr√§nde, Safaris und Wassersport: Mit diesen Worten wirbt die Plattform Urlaubsguru f√ºr das Reiseziel Sansibar, eine Insel, die zu Tansania geh√∂rt. ‚ÄûDer perfekte Ort, um die Seele baumeln zu lassen‚Äú, hei√üt es in einer Pressemitteilung von Dezember 2024. ‚ÄûDie Einheimischen sind sehr freundlich und hilfsbereit und die Sprache Englisch ist in den touristischen Gebieten weit verbreitet.‚Äú
Das liege daran, dass dort Stereotype ‚Äûdes gl√ºcklichen Afrikaners‚Äú idealisiert w√ºrden, sagt Siobhan. Sie war das zweite Mal in einem ostafrikanischen Land und ‚Äûkonnte es mit dem Wissen, das ich heute √ºber Rassismus und Kolonialismus hatte, nicht mehr genie√üen‚Äú. Auf ihrem TikTok-Account @allesscheissemann erkl√§rt die Deutsche, dass sie ‚Äûkeiner Person empfehlen w√ºrde, nach Sansibar zu reisen‚Äú. Vor allem nicht wei√üen Menschen.
Beliebtes Reiseziel: TikTok-Video ‚Äûfasst neokoloniale Strukturen sehr gut zusammen‚Äú
Sansibar ist ein beliebtes Reiseziel: Im Januar und Februar 2023 reisten fast 50 Prozent mehr Touristen in das Land als im Jahr zuvor, zeigen Daten der Nationalen Statistikbeh√∂rde (NBS) von Tansania. Nach den USA und Frankreich kommen die Drittmeisten aus Deutschland. Reiseveranstalter wie Tui oder Dertour reagieren und er√∂ffnen neue Ressorts auf Sansibar, wie die Welt berichtete.
‚ÄûSansibar ist wundersch√∂n, aber ich hab noch nie so viel akzeptierten Rassismus gesehen wie hier, einfach weil Menschen davon abh√§ngig sind‚Äú, sagt Siobhan. Wei√üe Touris k√∂nnten sich dort gef√ºhlt alles erlauben. Es sei ein schlimmes ‚ÄûMachtverh√§ltnis‚Äú zu sp√ºren. Sie habe das Gef√ºhl gehabt, als Touristin den postkolonialen Rassismus dort noch zu verst√§rken. J√ºrgen Zimmerer glaubt das sofort. Er ist Professor f√ºr die Geschichte Afrikas und leitet die Forschungsstelle Hamburgs (post-)koloniales Erbe an der Universit√§t Hamburg.
Das TikTok-Video ‚Äûfasse sehr gut die neokolonialen Strukturen zusammen‚Äú, die im Tourismus ehemaliger Kolonien existieren, sagt er. Zum einen, weil mehr als 100 Jahre nach dem Ende der gro√üen Kolonialreiche (im Zeitalter des Postkolonialismus) immer noch √∂konomischen Strukturen dazu f√ºhren w√ºrden, dass sich Europ√§er Urlaub auf Sansibar leisten k√∂nnen, viele Menschen aus Tansania aber keinen Urlaub in Deutschland. ‚ÄûZweitens hat sich Kolonialnostalgie als Marketing-Strategie der Tourismusindustrie entwickelt‚Äú, sagt Zimmerer BuzzFeed News Deutschland von IPPEN.MEDIA.
Menschen aus Europa w√ºrden ‚Äûin ehemalige Kolonien reisen, um ein koloniales Gef√ºhl wieder aufleben zu lassen‚Äú. Er nennt als Beispiele koloniale Lodges in S√ºdafrika, Sundowner auf den D√ºnen oder Fotosafaris mit dem Gel√§ndewagen in Namibia. ‚ÄûKolonialismusverherrlichung oder -nostalgie ist ‚Äì zumindest implizit ‚Äì ein Verkaufsargument‚Äú, sagt Zimmerer. Es werde eine ‚Äûkoloniale Traumwelt‚Äú mit exotischer Landschaft und Luxus verkauft. ‚ÄûDen Ziell√§ndern bleiben kaum Alternativen als hier mitzuspielen.‚Äú
‚ÄûIn deutscher Hand‚Äú: Was Touristinnen bei einer Reise nach Namibia √ºbersehen
Neben Sansibar, sei dieser Postkolonialismus auch in S√ºdafrika und in Namibia zu sp√ºren. ‚ÄûZehntausende deutsche Touristen fliegen jedes Jahr nach Deutsch-S√ºdwestafrika. Sie √ºbersehen dabei, dass die Tourismusindustrie in Namibia die koloniale Geschichte widerspiegelt, da viele der Lodges in deutscher Hand sind‚Äú, sagt Zimmerer BuzzFeed News Deutschland. Dies sei das Ergebnis der ‚Äûbrutalen deutschen Kolonialherrschaft, die zum ersten V√∂lkermord des 20. Jahrhunderts f√ºhrte, ver√ºbt von Deutschen an den Herero und Nama‚Äú. Um dessen Wiedergutmachung und Auss√∂hnung werde nun schon seit zehn Jahren verhandelt.
Reisende w√ºrden in Namibia kaum etwas von der Geschichte der Herero und Nama und der St√§mme Ovambo und San, mitbekommen. ‚ÄûMeist nur Zerrbilder ihrer vermeintlichen ‚ÄöPrimitivit√§t‚Äò‚Äú, sagt er. Dadurch w√ºrde koloniale Stereotype best√§tigt, mit Auswirkungen auf den Diskurs in Deutschland. Sein Tipp an alle, die trotzdem in postkoloniale L√§nder reisen wollen: ‚ÄûSich immer vor Augen f√ºhren, dass man selbst ein Nutznie√üer oder eine Nutznie√üerin der brutalen Geschichte des Kolonialismus war und ist.‚Äú

title: Income Stocks: A Once-in-a-Decade Chance to Get Rich
text: As the TSX today continues to recover, investors are likely to see their shares rise higher and higher in 2024. While some volatility may lie ahead, overall the market should continue to rebound, and we may even see all-time highs from stocks we never thought would rise again. Yet in this time, I urge you to not go straight towards growth stocks again. I say again because when investors had cash on hand, they decided that growth stocks were the answer. Yet when the market started to fall, these were the first companies to see their share price drop. Which is why income stocks are a far better option. Here‚Äôs why. Income over growth While huge returns are tempting, dividend income is stable ‚Äî especially when you find an income stock that has a long history of dividend payouts and that maintains a strong payout ratio. See, a payout ratio should remain between 50% and 80%. That‚Äôs the sweet spot. If it is anything higher, the stock may cut the dividend because it cannot keep up. Anything lower, and it‚Äôs just not a priority. You want dividends to be a priority when it comes to finding an income stock. But you also want growth to be a priority, too. After all, the pair go hand in hand. Without growth, the company can‚Äôt keep up with dividend payments after all. So, here‚Äôs what you should look for if you want to get rich off income stocks. Value, value, value Yes, value. There are a number of ways to identify value when you‚Äôre looking for income stocks. First, you want to check all the basic boxes. Is the company‚Äôs payout ratio healthy? Does the company have enough equity to handle all its debts? Have there been growth initiatives seeing returns climb higher? Then look at the share price compared to fundamentals. That‚Äôs where immense value lies for those looking to get rich. There are so many options out there right now that remain far below where the share price should be. Investors should consider the company‚Äôs share price compared to what the company is earning. Further, the share price compared to sales. It should also have a low enterprise value (EV) compared to earnings before interest, taxes, depreciation, and amortization (EBTIDA). If all these are low, then you likely have a value income stock on your hands. A stock to consider So, where is this magical unicorn of an income stock that could make you rich? A perfect choice these days would be Nexus Industrial REIT ( [TSX:NXR.UN](https://www.fool.ca/company/tsx-nxr-un-nexus-industrial-reit/364003/)). Nexus stock is in the industrial [properties](https://www.fool.ca/investing/top-canadian-reits-to-invest-in/) sector, a booming area of the market in high demand. And that‚Äôs only going to get stronger with the expansion of e-commerce. Yet Nexus stock is quite valuable. Shares are trading at 4.56 times earnings, with a whopping 8.01% dividend yield as of writing. The stock is still down 17% in the last year as of writing, though it has been recovering in recent months. It trades at 3.58 times sales, with an EV/EBITDA of just 9.37. With a payout ratio of 36%, the company may increase its dividends or use cash to pay its debts. If you were to put $15,000 towards Nexus stock then and see it return to 52-week highs, here is what you could end up with in 2024. |COMPANY||RECENT PRICE||NUMBER OF SHARES||DIVIDEND||TOTAL PAYOUT||FREQUENCY||PORTFOLIO TOTAL| |NXR.UN ‚Äì now||$8||1,875||$0.64||$1,200||monthly||$15,000| |NXR.UN ‚Äì high||$11.25||1,875||$0.64||$1,200||monthly||$21,093.75| That investment alone could achieve returns of $6,093.75 and dividends of $1,200. That comes out monthly as well! And then you‚Äôll have a total of $7,293.74 in [passive income](https://www.fool.ca/investing/how-to-make-passive-income-in-canada/). So, get it while it lasts because it may not be around for another decade.

Revisi√≥ del model ling√º√≠stic: un pas enrere per la llengua catalana
Un altre tema important ha estat la revisi√≥ del model ling√º√≠stic promoguda pel Partit Popular amb el suport de Vox. Aquesta revisi√≥ posa en perill la pres√®ncia del catal√† a les aules en un moment en qu√® la llengua ja es troba en una situaci√≥ de fragilitat a causa dels canvis socioling√º√≠stics que vivim. L‚Äôacord PP-Vox, per aprovar els pressuposts de la comunitat suposa un atac directe al model ling√º√≠stic dels centres educatius, amb la intenci√≥ d‚Äôintroduir el castell√† com a llengua vehicular i permetre que docents sense acreditaci√≥ ling√º√≠stica accedeixin a places de funcionari.
I el m√©s preocupant √©s que aquest acord no s‚Äôacaba aqu√≠: deixen clar que estudiaran amb Vox ¬´altres possibles canvis legislatius¬ª en educaci√≥, obrint la porta a m√©s retrocessos. A m√©s, el Govern ha renovat el seu comprom√≠s amb el Pla de segregaci√≥ ling√º√≠stica que ja va ser rebutjat per la comunitat educativa. Tot aix√≤ sense cap justificaci√≥ pedag√≤gica i √∫nicament per satisfer els interessos de l‚Äôextrema dreta que vol desmantellar all√≤ que ha costat d√®cades de lluita a la nostra societat. El Govern aix√≠, continua posant en perill la compet√®ncia ling√º√≠stica del nostre alumnat en les dues lleng√ºes oficials.
L‚Äôaposta per la privada-concertada: desequilibris i precarietat a l‚Äôescola p√∫blica
Finalment, un altre aspecte destacat ha estat el suport del Govern del PP a l‚Äôescola privada concertada. A les Illes Balears tenim un sistema d‚Äôensenyament p√∫blic complementat per una xarxa concertada, un model que ha funcionat b√©, tot i que √©s necessari un repartiment m√©s equitatiu de l‚Äôalumnat vulnerable entre les dues xarxes. Tanmateix, el Govern del PP est√† fent tot el contrari amb la seva pol√≠tica d‚Äôescolaritzaci√≥, reduint les zones escolars, modificant els barems per aconseguir pla√ßa escolar i concertant noves places a la privada quan encara hi ha places disponibles a la p√∫blica. De fet, recentment han anunciat que, a partir del curs 2025-2026, la majoria dels centres de les Illes Balears no hauran de reservar places per als alumnes amb Necessitats Educatives de Suport Espec√≠fic (NESE) una vegada es publiquin les llistes definitives d‚Äôadmissi√≥. D‚Äôaquesta manera, els centres concertats podran assignar places a alumnes ordinaris i no participaran en la redistribuci√≥ de l‚Äôalumnat nouvingut, que sol ser NESE i arriba a partir de setembre i al llarg del curs. Aix√≤ far√† que els centres p√∫blics concentrin, encara m√©s, la major part de l‚Äôalumnat vulnerable.
Un altre exemple que evidencia els desequilibris que s‚Äôhan consentit entre la p√∫blica i la concertada √©s la desigual introducci√≥ dels psic√≤legs educatius a Secund√†ria: 39 psic√≤legs a la xarxa p√∫blica i 36 a la concertada. Quan la p√∫blica t√© 32.141 alumnes i la concertada 5.479 segons dades de la Conselleria. D‚Äôaquesta manera si els centres p√∫blics concentren la major part de l‚Äôalumnat vulnerable i no compten amb els recursos adequats no es garanteix la seva igualtat d‚Äôoportunitats a les nostres illes.
L‚ÄôEscola d‚ÄôHoteleria d‚ÄôEivissa: una promesa incomplerta
Per altra banda, tamb√© cal assenyalar la manca d‚Äôoferta p√∫blica reglada de l‚ÄôEscola d‚ÄôHoteleria d‚ÄôEivissa, tot i aprovar-se al Parlament una proposici√≥ socialista en aquest sentit. Amb el per√≠ode de sol¬∑licitud de places a la Formaci√≥ Professional ja iniciat, el Govern no ha creat la mateixa oferta de cicles de formaci√≥ professional, certificats professionals, graus A i B, especialitats formatives del SOIB i t√≠tols propis de l‚ÄôEscola d‚ÄôHoteleria de les Illes Balears que realitza a la seva seu de Palma, sempre tenint en compte les especificitats d‚ÄôEivissa.
Conclusi√≥: retrocessos en l‚Äôeducaci√≥
En definitiva, i amb Vox de nou com a soci del PP, tornen les pol√≠tiques de confrontaci√≥ ling√º√≠stica i es reforcen les d‚Äôafebliment de l‚Äôescola p√∫blica. Quan caldria desenvolupar un sistema educatiu que respecti la nostra llengua, que garanteixi la igualtat d‚Äôoportunitats i que prioritzi el benestar i la qualitat de l‚Äôeducaci√≥ per a tot l‚Äôalumnat.

author: Saptarshi Sinha
title: Matt Hardy Teases Potential WWE Return, Anthony Henry Credits Eddie Kingston For AEW Gig
text:
During a recent appearance on the ‚ÄúInsight‚Äù podcast, TNA World Tag Team Champion Matt Hardy discussed his return to TNA, the importance of The Hardys‚Äô current title run, the possibility of a WWE return through its partnership with TNA, and other topics.
You can check out some highlights from the podcast below:
On what the current TNA Tag Team Title reign means for him: ‚ÄúI think this particular title just shows that people need to get their tenses right. A lot of people say in past tense ‚ÄòThe Hardys were great.‚Äô But present tense is what they need to speak in that the Hardys are great. We had a couple of years at AEW where people thought oh my God, maybe these guys are done or they‚Äôre finished, whatever. We came back to TNA, and kudos to TNA for putting us in a position to succeed. We rocked and rolled as the original OG Hardy Boys, more or less, and then we ended up earning a tag team title shot and we built to that Full Metal Mayhem at Bound for Glory, which was Full Metal Mayhem reimagined with all of Jeff‚Äôs art on the tables and ladders and chairs and whatnot. We earned these titles, these mean a lot to us and we‚Äôre really happy to be back and be very prevalent again in our position.‚Äù
On why TNA was the right fit to go back: ‚ÄúIt just worked out right because they offered me something, just a couple days out with the Moose thing, doing a little program with Moose. I went in initially on a handshake deal and we said I‚Äôll work through Against All Odds and we‚Äôll see what I end up doing by then. If that ends up being the last day then we have a match, he retains the title and then I‚Äôll go wherever. It turned out that Jeff‚Äôs deal had expired at AEW one day before that. So it was crazy timing. Then he ended up showing up that day. It was a huge reaction and Jeff said, Man, I love what you‚Äôve been doing, and it‚Äôs been so cool. I think we should have a run here, it seems like this is a really good spot for us. They would put us in a position to succeed, which they have, and we can help TNA because they‚Äôve been hot this year with Joe Hendry, they‚Äôve had the NXT exchange, which has been great. They‚Äôre really having a true resurgence, and we think we‚Äôve helped add to that, which is very cool.‚Äù
On a possible WWE return as part of their partnership with TNA: ‚ÄúI feel good about that, that‚Äôs one of the great things about working with TNA. They know that we do have a lot of love for WWE. They know that we would like to one day do the Hall of Fame. We filmed some content for WWE that‚Äôll probably be dropping pretty soon. I saw The Dudleys did it the day before us and I know theirs just dropped recently. But we have a good working relationship with them. I think the perfect storm arose. I think you could see us pop up even as TNA champs on some WWE show at some point. Who knows?‚Äù
On how The Hardys want to end their careers: ‚ÄúI would imagine it would probably go out that way. We came in that way, we would probably go out that way. Then for Jeff, I could see him, he‚Äôll end up being an artist living in Cameron, North Carolina or whatever he‚Äôs doing. I think I‚Äôm a lifer in the business. I‚Äôll be working somewhere as a producer or an agent or creative or whatever else, just because I‚Äôm so passionate about pro wrestling. I think once I stop being an in-ring performer, I will still contribute.‚Äù
During a recent appearance on the ‚ÄúAEW Unrestricted‚Äù podcast, Anthony Henry revealed that Eddie Kingston helped him land a job in AEW.
He said, ‚ÄúI got the chance to wrestle Eddie Kingston, who I wrestled in Evolve and we were good friends with. That was another lucky situation where, again, locker room rapport, right? He went out of his way to make sure and try to get me a job. He could have eaten me up because he was a star, but he did not do that, instead he gave me 80% of the match, sold for me, and Tony was very happy with it I think. From there, I‚Äôve been here since. Crazy how things work out but it was literally the day of my non-compete being up.‚Äù
Henry made his AEW debut in 2021, just days after his WWE non-compete clause ended.

author: MarketScreener
title: Siemens : and Stadtwerke Stuttgart partner to spearhead transition to sustainable urban energy - MarketScreener
text:
Press
Zug, Switzerland, July 19, 2024
Siemens and Stadtwerke Stuttgart partner to spearhead transition to sustainable urban energy
Stadtwerke Stuttgart headquarters serves as lighthouse project for state-of-the-art building and energy management systems Represents optimal 'sector coupling' showcase, using Siemens Xcelerator applications to intelligently connect buildings and transport to renewable energy sources Supports Stuttgart in achieving climate neutral targets, setting example to other cities worldwide in sustainable urban transformation Siemens Smart Infrastructure and publicly owned energy supplier Stadtwerke Stuttgart GmbH, have announced their partnership to help drive the transition to sustainable urban energy across the city.
Yesterday's inauguration of the Stadtwerke Stuttgart headquarters marks the culmination of 18 months of collaborative planning and implementation, which brings together Siemens expertise in sustainable infrastructure development with Stadtwerke Stuttgart's experience in renewable energy generation and supply.
Applications from the open digital business platform, Siemens Xcelerator, are used to control the intelligent energy management system across the facility's office complex, warehouse and workshop. It optimally connects the supply of, and demand for, renewable energy for everything from heating and lighting to elevators and office equipment, in addition to electrifying the mobility hub, which will be used to charge electric vehicles from across the Stadtwerke Stuttgart fleet.
This intelligent combination of digital applications and renewable energy supply will

This will serve as a further showcase for other businesses looking to maximize sector coupling to deliver more cost effective, energy efficient and therefore sustainable operations.
"The combination of Siemens expertise in building management and ours in the energy industry creates solutions that not only help us to achieve our own sustainability goals but also help us to support other organizations in their energy transition" said Peter Drausnigg, Technical Managing Director at Stadtwerke Stuttgart. "We see ourselves as the driving force behind the energy transition in Stuttgart and are proud to be working with Siemens to set an example for other businesses and cities to follow around the world."
At the heart of the building management system from Siemens is intelligent Digital Twin technology. Siemens Smart Infrastructure Building X 360¬∞ Viewer and Energy Manager offer digital representations of the headquarters, utilizing Artificial Intelligence (AI) insights to retrieve and process relevant real time data from installed building and e-mobility technology. Building X is a digital building platform that supports customers to digitalize, manage, and optimize their building operations.
From Internet of Things (IoT) sensors for lighting control to fire protection and security applications, such insights will help to achieve energy savings of up to 30 percent. Such insights enable 24/7 transparency of live and historical events and generate up to 10 percent more net operating income. In the mobility hub for example, electric vehicle charging is optimized to maximize available renewable energy and by using intelligent insights on working patterns, charging is guaranteed to be complete for when each employee finishes work.
Matthias Rebellius, Managing Board Member of Siemens AG and CEO of Smart Infrastructure added: "We are delighted to be working in partnership with Stadtwerke Stuttgart to show how we can combine the real and the digital worlds to drive genuine sustainable transformation.
"Intelligent building and energy management optimizes the use of renewable energy sources, maximizing efficient operations while minimizing impact on the energy grid.
